      • provisionStack

        public void provisionStack(java.lang.Long userId,
                           java.lang.String appName,
                           int stackId,
                           int stackSizeId)
                    throws StacksException
        Provision a Stack to the Kubernetes cluster.
        Parameters:
        userId - The User ID for this Stack
        appName - Logical Name for this Application
        stackId - The Stack ID to add
        stackSizeId - The Stack Size for this Stack
        Throws:
        StacksException - if something bad happened
